00026 #ifndef ED2KCONSTANTS_H
00027 #define ED2KCONSTANTS_H
00028 
00029 #include <common/Macros.h>
00030 
00031 // MOD Note: Do not change this part - Merkur
00032 
00033 // Timeouts & Reask times
00034 #define CONNECTION_TIMEOUT          40000   // set this lower if you want less connections at once, set  it higher if you have enough sockets (edonkey has its own timout too, so a very high value won't effect this)
00035 #define FILEREASKTIME               1300000 // 1300000 <- original value ***
00036 #define SERVERREASKTIME             800000  // don't set this too low, it wont speed up anything, but it could kill amule or your internetconnection
00037 #define UDPSERVERREASKTIME          1300000 // 1300000 <- original value ***
00038 #define SOURCECLIENTREASKS          MIN2MS(40)  //40 mins
00039 #define SOURCECLIENTREASKF          MIN2MS(5)   //5 mins
00040 #define UDPSERVERSTATTIME       SEC2MS(5)   //5 secs
00041 #define UDPSERVSTATREASKTIME    HR2MS(4.5)      //4 hours - eMule uses HR2S, we are based on GetTickCount, hence MS
00042 #define UDPSERVSTATMINREASKTIME MIN2MS(20)  //minimum time between two pings even when trying to force a premature ping for a new UDP key
00043 #define MINCOMMONPENALTY        4 // For file sources reask
00044 
00045 #define ED2KREPUBLISHTIME       MIN2MS(1)   //1 min
00046 
00047 #define UDPMAXQUEUETIME         SEC2MS(30)  //30 Seconds
00048 
00049 #define RSAKEYSIZE              384         //384 bits
00050 
00051 #define MAX_SOURCES_FILE_SOFT   500
00052 #define MAX_SOURCES_FILE_UDP    50
00053 
00054 #define MAXFILECOMMENTLEN       50
00055 
00056 #define MIN_UP_CLIENTS_ALLOWED          2   // min. clients allowed to download regardless UPLOAD_CLIENT_DATARATE or any other factors. Don't set this too high
00057 
00058 #define SOURCEEXCHANGE2_VERSION         4       // replaces the version sent in MISC_OPTIONS flag from SX1
00059 
00060 // MOD Note: end
00061 
00062 #define MAXCONPER5SEC               20
00063 #define MAX_UP_CLIENTS_ALLOWED          250 // max. clients allowed regardless UPLOAD_CLIENT_DATARATE or any other factors. Don't set this too low, use DATARATE to adjust uploadspeed per client
00064 #define DOWNLOADTIMEOUT             100000
00065 #define CONSERVTIMEOUT              25000   // agelimit for pending connection attempts
00066 #define RARE_FILE               50
00067 #define MIN_REQUESTTIME             590000
00068 #define MAX_PURGEQUEUETIME          HR2MS(1)
00069 #define PURGESOURCESWAPSTOP         MIN2MS(15)  // How long forbid swapping a source to a certain file (NNP,...)
00070 #define CONNECTION_LATENCY          22050   // latency for responces
00071 #define CLIENTBANTIME               HR2MS(2) // 2h
00072 #define TRACKED_CLEANUP_TIME            HR2MS(1) 
00073 #define KEEPTRACK_TIME              HR2MS(2) // how long to keep track of clients which were once in the uploadqueue
00074 #define CLIENTLIST_CLEANUP_TIME MIN2MS(34)  // 34 min
00075 
00076 // (4294967295/PARTSIZE)*PARTSIZE = ~4GB
00077 #define OLD_MAX_FILE_SIZE 4290048000ull
00078 
00079 // = 2^38 = 256GB
00080 #define MAX_FILE_SIZE 0x4000000000ull
00081 
00082 const uint64 PARTSIZE       = 9728000ull;
00083 const uint32 BLOCKSIZE      = 184320u;
00084 const uint32 EMBLOCKSIZE    = 184320u;
00085 
00086 #define INV_SERV_DESC_LEN           0xF0FF  // Used as an 'invalid' string len for OP_SERVER_DESC_REQ/RES
00087 
00088 // This 'identifier' is used for referencing shared part (incomplete) files with the OP_ASKSHAREDDIRS and related opcodes
00089 // it was introduced with eDonkeyHybrid and is considered as part of the protocol.
00090 #define OP_INCOMPLETE_SHARED_FILES wxT("!Incomplete Files")
00091 
00092 // ed2k search expression comparison operators
00093 // kad operators used to be different, but are the same since eMule 0.47a
00094 enum ed2k_search_compare {
00095     ED2K_SEARCH_OP_EQUAL        =   0, // eserver 16.45+
00096     ED2K_SEARCH_OP_GREATER,     // dserver
00097     ED2K_SEARCH_OP_LESS,        // dserver
00098     ED2K_SEARCH_OP_GREATER_EQUAL,   // eserver 16.45+
00099     ED2K_SEARCH_OP_LESS_EQUAL,  // eserver 16.45+
00100     ED2K_SEARCH_OP_NOTEQUAL
00101 };
00102
